ca.corefacility.gview.map.items

Interface MapItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, GViewEventListener, MapComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BackboneItem, BackboneShapeItem, BackboneTextItem, FeatureItem, ShapeItem, TextItem
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBackboneShapeItem, AbstractBackboneTextItem, AbstractShapeItem, BackboneLabelItem, BackboneTextItemImp, BasicBackboneItem, BasicItem, BorderItem, FeatureItemImp, LabelLineItem, PlotItem, TextItemImp

    public interface MapItem
extends MapComponent, GViewEventListener
    An item that is stored on a map.
